title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-4.3 - Operator furnished information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-4.3 - Operator furnished information

State Regulations
(a) Every operator shall provide the one-call
notification system at least the following information: (1)
corporate or other name and address of
such operator; and
(2)
department, agency, office or individual designated by the operator to be notified by the
one-call notification system or excavators and the local address and telephone
number of such department, agency, office or individual. (b) Whenever such information is revised, changed or found to be incomplete or incorrect, the operator shall provide
corrected information to each one-call notification system in which he or she
participates. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
753-4.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
